reasons.title: We’re sorry to see you go
reasons.reasonHint: In order to provide better services in the future, we’d like to know why you’ve decided to close your account
reasons.voteHint: Please rate your experience using this product
reasons.reasonsTitle: What is the reason you have decided to close your account?

reasons.title: I´m no longer using this account
I´m not satisfied with the interest rate
I´m not satisfied with the services
I wish to invest the funds

reasonsCurrentAccount.title: I have a new / another current account with a different bank
I have a mortgage with another bank which requires that I use the bank’s current account
I´m not satisfied with MONETA Money Bank

introForeignCurrency.title: What happens when you close an account?
introForeignCurrency.item1Title: Select an alternative account where to send the balance in your account
introForeignCurrency.item1Description: That includes any money you receive during the closing process.
introForeignCurrency.item2Title: The account will be closed within 40 days
introForeignCurrency.item2Description: All cards and standing orders associated with this account will be canceled as well.
introForeignCurrency.item3Description: Once you close your account, it cannot be restored. You will need to open a new one.
introForeignCurrency.message: Do you want to convert the remaining balance to another currency? Make the exchange before closing the account to keep full control over the exchange rate.

balanceTransfer.title: Close account {0}
balanceTransfer.balanceSectionTitle: Where should we transfer the remaining balance?
balanceTransfer.otherProductsTerminationSectionTitle: Together with the account, you will also close

balanceTransferConfirmation.title: This action cannot be undone
balanceTransferConfirmation.detail: If you decide to close this account, you will not be able to recover. Thus, if you ever wish to open a current account with MONETA Money Bank again, it will be a brand new account. You can still change your mind and decide to close the account later.
balanceTransferConfirmation.primaryButton: I have read and understood the information. Continue

success.title: Done! Thank you for using MONETA Money Bank.
success.detail: Closing the account might take a while. If there is a problem we will contact you.

successForeignCurrency.title:
Done!
Your account will be closed within 40 days
successForeignCurrency.listItem: All cards and standing orders associated with this account will be canceled as well.

contractDisagree.title: Your agreement is required in order to continue
contractDisagree.detail: Do you have any questions? Call us or visit the nearest branch.

error.title: Unfortunately, the account cannot be closed at this moment

statusErrors.text: Please close the account in person at one of our branches. The account cannot be closed online.
The account cannot be closed at this moment due to an unprocessed transaction. Please try again later.
Please close the account in person at one of our branches. The account cannot be closed online as it is tied to another product:
The account is overdrawn or might become overdrawn during the closing process and thus cannot be closed online. Please close the account in person at one of our branches.
